projects.title: Passport Photo Generator
projects.description: A website that generates valid passport photos given any reasonable base image. Rotates and centers image, then crops background using deep learning.

projects.title: Leveraged ETFs
projects.description: My research at PURE @ UIUC involved testing a hedging strategy by backsimulating stocks, backtesting the trading algorithm, and incorporating into a trading portfolio.

projects.title: Falling Fruit
projects.description: A non-profit public database for foragers and gatherers. I worked on a team to rebuild the front-end for optimization/scalability.

projects.title: Escape the Maze Game
projects.description: Run away! A maze game where players spawn in a randomly regenerating maze with enemy AI chasing the player down.

projects.title: MIT Battlecode
projects.description: Real time strategy game tournament where teams compete to build the best AI to play the game. Our team placed 22nd/550 and 4th/52.

projects.title: Discord Registration Bot
projects.description: Club member registration bot for the Absolute Coding Club discord. This bot has registered hundreds of users.
